title: Well I guess I won't be playing THIS game
body:
No idea why this has been happening so much more often.

I JUST WENT INTO A CUSTOM MATCH PRIOR TO THIS GAME JUST TO TEST IF MY CONNECTION TO LEAGUE'S SERVERS WAS FINE AND COULD PLAY JUST PERFECTLY.

Also I already have a "Leaver" a few matches ago due to this exact same thing, so I wouldn't be surprised if this will make me get a temp ban...

Ten attempts to reconnect, even restarted my internet and computer. Nothing.

/vent/rant

http://i.imgur.com/yL0a0vd.jpg
